Class Driver

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.finalproject.Driver

  • public class Driver
extends java.lang.Object
    Driver class, handles moving the robot.
    Author:
    Justin Tremblay, Josh Inscoe

      • Driver

        public Driver(EV3LargeRegulatedMotor leftMotor,
              EV3LargeRegulatedMotor rightMotor,
              EV3LargeRegulatedMotor topMotor,
              EV3MediumRegulatedMotor frontMotor)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        leftMotor - Motor powering the left wheel.
        rightMotor - Motor powering the right wheel.
        topMotor - Motor used to cross the zip line.
        frontMotor - Motor to which the sensors are mounted.
